page.title: 15DAY IN LIFE OF GIRL, AGED 8
page.content:
A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JENNIFER AGED 8
On Friday I woke up got dressed and had{breakfast.}I had a kind of instant porridge and a cup of tea, then I went to{school. I did Maths, English and Science and then we had{dinner.}We had shepherd's pie, peas, carrots and for pudding we had egg custard tart. After dinner we had assembly, sang songs and had a story. Then we did P.E. We went{home}at 3-30 p.m. and watched T.V. and had{tea.}Then I went to{Brownies.}I made a Mother's Day card and played games. Then I came home and got undressed and went to {bed.
